system.description:
Your connection to two potent sources of supernatural power has matured you into an unorthodox, but very effective, spellcaster. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4enpadkozx8d4jyl]{Sixth Arcanum}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2gt0w3lau2wsaz54]{Seventh Arcanum}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.csmgapoevjtlj8b8]{Eighth Arcanum}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.kcn45lkzabmwipp3]{Penultimate Arcanum} invocations.
  • You gain an additional benefit based on your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.9m8p73ihwnicm2zi]{Pact Boon}:
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6co2rqjh9npjg3eb]{Pact of the Blade}, once per turn you can spend spell points up to half your proficiency bonus when you hit with an attack using your pact weapon. If you do, it deals an additional 1d8 points of damage per spell point spent this way. The damage can be of any type your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast} can deal.
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2mfiz8spijbzs6h]{Pact of the Chain}, your familiar is invulnerable to damage dealt by your spells, Elemental Blast, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ulmcmf3ofmpzmgzf]{Eldritch Blast}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ccymzytvxost335r]{Invocations}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l8yj9brt80jxrqj0]{Adaptations}. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sa8lr3mktzty24m6]{Frog Fangs} invocation if you do not already have it, or another invocation of your choice if you do.
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2dp9b4a11fuxjwbc]{Pact of the Tome}, 1/3rd of your elementalist levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of determining what level of warlock spells you can cast and vice versa.
